actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Nevada except by express authorization of Congress.
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Prohibits any further extension or establishment of national parks and monuments in Nevada from being undertaken except by express authorization of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the further extension or establishment of national monuments in Nevada except by express authorization of Congress.
